title: While the System Crashed - Novel Updates
author: A Lifetime Of Beautiful Clothes   Yī Shì Huá Shang   一世华裳
description: On April 1st, 20XX, I came across something good and something bad. The good thing is that I obtained a transmigration machine and could travel around through transmigration. The bad thing is that when it got halfway through the transmigration process, the System crashed——《Tang You’s Memoir》>
